Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Clarifies standards for glass repair and calibration of advanced driver assistance systems
Summary: Clarifies standards for glass repair and calibration of advanced driver assistance systems for motor vehicle glass repair facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง392-k, Gen Bus L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.4879-B & A.6943-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to clarifying requirements for glass repair and calibration of advanced driver assistance systems; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the general business law relating to establishing standards for glass repair and calibration of advanced driver assistance systems, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 4879-B and A. 6943-B, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
